recommended_treatment: Adjuvant chemotherapy with carboplatin and paclitaxel combined with external beam radiation therapy (with or without vaginal brachytherapy) per NCCN guidelines for stage IIIC1 uterine serous carcinoma
description: High-grade uterine serous carcinoma with greater than 50% myometrial invasion and pelvic lymph node metastasis (pT1b, pN1).
patient_notes: This report shows a high-grade uterine cancer called serous carcinoma that has grown deep into the uterus and spread to a pelvic lymph node. Your medical team will discuss options like chemotherapy and radiation therapy to treat this diagnosis.

verification.assessment: The staging (FIGO IIIC1, pT1b pN1 pM0) is accurate and consistent with the pathology details, but the treatment field omitted the guideline-recommended adjuvant chemotherapy and radiation.

recommended_treatment.issues: Missing specific NCCN guideline recommendations for stage IIIC1 uterine serous carcinoma
